Description:
Detects network connections to Devtunnels domains initiated by a process on a system. Attackers can abuse that feature to establish a reverse shell or persistence on a machine.


Author: Kamran Saifullah
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Network Connection Initiated To DevTunnels Domain
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where initiated = 'true' and dst_host like '%.devtunnels.ms'
